faq.question: Is the Starter plan really free?
faq.answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free forever with no credit card required. It includes all essential features to get started.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate your billing.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment in full.

faq.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.answer: We offer email support for all plans, with priority support for Pro users and dedicated support for Enterprise customers.
